alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 10:25PM CST until March 06 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Conway County in central Arkansas... Central Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 1100 PM CST. * At 1025 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plainview in Yell County, or near Danville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville... Danville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Ola... Adona... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Petit Jean State Park... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Mosley... Belleville... Casa... Aplin... Corinth... Birta... Ada... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 86 and 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central Arkansas.
